metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\fs24{\fs48\b bobobo's JSFX repository\b}\line\line This is a collection of stuff\line\line add the repository: https://bobobo-git.github.io/jsfx/reapack/index.xml\line\line }

{\rtf1\ansi\fs24Links: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://bobobo-git.github.io/jsfx/reapack/index.xml"}} {\fldrslt website}} / \line\line {\fs48\b dub stuff with AKAI Midi Mix\b}\line\line if you have an AKAI MIDI Mix and want to do some thing with it you can use these scripts\line to get things done\line you may have a look at https://bobobo.de/reaper/midimix_3_knobs_recarm_all_in_4\line you'll find hopefulkly some explanations and templates

{\rtf1\ansi\fs24Links: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://bobobo.de/reaper/J--sat SFX/"}} {\fldrslt website}} / \line\line {\fs48\b OwnSynth\b}\line\line This is a simple synth using\line sine saw square and triangle waves (created from sine waves)\line with hipass and lowpass filters with resonance,\line a sub (oct down) and aub (oct up)\line diable pitchrange settings\line and a clipper.\line and mono to 16 voices\line it is not realy polyphone, you got one osc per note in time\line\line THIS STUFF IS MONO\line\line Mainly made to get a simple synth done n JSFX}

{\rtf1\ansi\fs24Links: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://bobobo.de/reaper/JSFX/"}} {\fldrslt website}} / \line\line {\fs48\b OwnSynth\b}\line\line This is a simple synth using\line sine saw square and triangle waves (created from sine waves)\line with hipass and lowpass filters with resonance,\line a sub (oct down) and aub (oct up)\line diable pitchrange settings\line and a clipper.\line and mono to 16 voices\line and this one has a diable chorus\line it is not realy polyphone, you got one osc per note in time\line\line THIS STUFF IS MONO\line\line Mainly made to get a simple synth done n JSFX}

{\rtf1\ansi\fs24Links: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://bobobo.de/reaper/JSFX/"}} {\fldrslt website}} / \line\line {\fs48\b OwnSynth\b}\line\line This is a simple synth using\line sine saw square and triangle waves (created from sine waves)\line with hipass and lowpass filters with resonance,\line a sub (oct down) and aub (oct up)\line diable pitchrange settings\line and a clipper.\line and mono to 16 voices\line and this one has a diable chorus\line it is not realy polyphone, you got one osc per note in time\line\line THIS STUFF IS NOT MONO\line\line Mainly made to get a simple synth done n JSFX}

{\rtf1\ansi\fs24Links: {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://bobobo.de/reaper/notes_and_tunings/"}} {\fldrslt website}} / \line\line {\fs48\b OwnSynth\b}\line\line This is a simple synth using\line waveforms to play diable variable evenly spaced octave steps. more info on the website\line \line \line THIS STUFF IS MONO\line\line }
{\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b OwnChorus I\b}\line\line a chorus with fixed values\line THIS STUFF IS MONO\line\line }
{\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b OwnChorus I\b}\line\line another stereo chorus with fixed values\line THIS STUFF IS NOT MONO\line\line }
{\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b OwnChorus I\b}\line\line another stereo chorus with fixed values\line THIS STUFF IS NOT MONO\line\line }
{\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b OwnHiLo I\b}\line\line filter hipass and lowpass wthg chorus and a clipper\line THIS STUFF IS MONO\line\line }
{\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b OwnHiLo I\b}\line\line filter hipass and lowpass wthg chorus and a clipper\line THIS STUFF IS PANABLE\line\line }

version.author: bobobo
version.changelog: + hipass values below 1000 raisea a lowpassfilter + samplevalues goes from -0.99 to 0.99 (very hard limiter) + + a bunch more things

metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b variable ToneGenerator\b}\line\line to generate tones with variable subdivisions\line \line\line }
{\rtf1\ansi\fs24 {\fs48\b stemsplitter Arguments\r\b}\line\line if you are in urge to use some against thgis crap\line \line\line }
